sentence: The service everywhere bar concierge reception was outstanding
Perfect and friendly service

the staff are excellent rooms are large spotless and everything in good orderfacilities main building is under constructionin room dining menu is limited an incredible expensive

Service at all levels was very good
Service of the staff is outstanding

Very nice and friendly staff provided great services when needed

Unlike the Four Seasons now the Grill Room the staff at the Okura is Japanese and carry on a standard and tradition of elevated and discerning service that totally matches with the very best hotels in Tokyo
The reduction in restaurants the closure of pool and spa facilities and reduction of staff to the level there ’s no help for your luggage
The main service part is still intact but with debilitatingly reduced facilities

It ’s an old hotel with old furniture needs a renewal location is not really good but everything is 10 15 minutes by taxi which is provided by hotel staff are not very friendly rooms are overpriced compared to others no late checkout is allowed as you have to pay for 2 hours or half a night for more
The hotel is being run into the ground before it closes zero facilities and sad staff
The hotel is tired and scruffy and it is being maintained by a skeleton staff because it is being run into the ground before it closes immediately after the olympics in 2020
Only complaint is that all the good food service ie restaurants are in the newer buildings
It should nt actually what an amazing hotel and again unbeatable service
Rude people at the front desk that lies to you

they both had deplorable hygiene no english no tech skills and when i she the one staffer went to reach for my computer i was shocked and disgusted to see his hands entirely covered in red bruises and putrefaction from biting his nails and skin

x 2 you lose your points if you do nt use it within 2 years the building is coming down for sure post olympic games the yakutas are the same the amenities no change the old ladies still there its ok if you want to be in Ropongi hills and ark Hills wifi was consistent you have to ask but they did acomodate requests for hodling packages sending packages all good will miss the OLD OKURA with the garden eatery now goneits been torn down in late august to give way to high rise housing room service and facilities limited you need to fight to use the swimming pool n gym facilities in the new block the post office is gone the hairdresser is still there otherwise the museum is now finally open after years of being closed
